post.body: @dj200423 But I liked it better than I thought I would. You'll read more on my thoughts when I post a review this weekend
@dj200423 I actually enjoyed it...I haven't seen the original yet, but it makes me want to so I can compare
Me too...and if I don't then I will buy it
Hey lady...how are you?
Let me know when you can get me the movies...my schedule is ridiculous next week with all of my 6 finals and studying for them
Welcome to the Twitter party...you're late
All right...sounds good to me...just send me the script when you're ready
Just me and John for sure
Yeah it was bound to happen sooner or later
If CBS Early Show is RC Cola then The View must be the Zima
But at least Keanu is in a role where his out-of-body voice fits...and Jon Hamm from Mad Men is in it...GROW UP!
I don't think anyone is saying IMAX makes a film better but it enhances the experience but cannot make a bad film good
Ask them if seeing Led Zeppelin live would make their music better? You're right...it's about the ENHANCED experience
Glad you're enjoying...can't wait to get other contributors going on it
By the way are you going to send me your script or treatment or whatever you wanted my notes on for the comedy?
Oh you have no idea how often I check it
Sounds good...see you then
Who all is going?
I have finals from 8am until 12:20pm but anytime after that is good...meet somewhere or just come to my place?
Old School was the other one...when can you get them to me?
Also, Santa Grunny if you could call me to sort out the details for the aforementioned internship that would be great
Santa Grunny...I would like a visit to the Heroes set when I'm in LA this summer...or even better an internship in production
Way to go! When are you going back to Elkhart?
Damn straight...I nailed It's a Wonderful Life first but I wonder since I just won another contest if I'm getting bypassed
Holiday Inn is a great musical classic #spoutxmas
A Muppet Christmas Carol must be watched every year #spoutxmas
He's actually retired otherwise he would have done Indy 4
It's a Wonderful Life...I still need to watch that this year #spoutxmas
Elf...a modern Christmas classic #spoutxmas
I'm going with Home Alone #spoutxmas
Oh that is unbelievably hilarious...I love that anteater picture...this blog is going to rock my world
For how long?
Why am I not what?
I love those...there's a book you can buy with a bunch of them
Watching them with Max at his house
Cool...I'm excited b/c a friend who works at an agency in LA brought Oscar screeners (Benjamin Button, Wrestler + more on DVD)
Man, you guys get good movies down there. We're lucky to get one indie movie per month here. It's a suckfest
Let me know how that place is...My family and I have always wondered and never gone to the one around here
Whew! Praise, Christ! FUCK YEAH CHRISTMAS!
Nah, just kidding...I love websites for Xmas
Make sure you give me the receipt
You should do a short film with them and call it Tengo and Cash (you will be playing Johnny Cash though) I smell OSCAR!
Is that your Mom who joined Twitter? I want to follow her. I'll bet she is a DELIGHT
You are an epic rock force on Amazon...SO MUCH POWER! What do you want for Christmas Santa Grunny?
I'll DM you my e-mail and AIM and we can talk more...also I can get you in touch with my web design guys
Right on...sounds like we can help each other
Next week will be the worst week ever...I will be enjoying half of this weekend and then killing myself with studying from Sun. until Sat.
Heading to the theater for The Day the Earth Stood Still...probably more excited about the X-Men Origins: Wolverine trailer to be honest
Official explanation of extinction of dinosaurs http://tinyurl.com/2xu2pd
Decided to see The Day the Earth Stood Still with @johncessna at midnight...not necessary but it's something to do
Previously helpful History TA concludes e-mail with "Stay warm...it is *COLD* out." Looks like our final is on the Cold War questions
My HIST 104 prof mentioned white Russians as a people & my ears perked up & I got thirsty...that's the only thing I've heard in this class
One final down...felt pretty solid...nailed the essays but not overly confident about true/false section...only 5 more finals to go
Heading off to Final #1 - Jewish Cinema...should be a cakewalk
Christmas Song of the Day: Dec. 15 - "And so this is Christmas..." http://tinyurl.com/ybs3ur
Why is Dick Tracy on Sci-Fi Channel?
Oscar screeners today! EXCITED!!
It's good to be home. But I feel like I'm even more lazy here than I was when I didn't have anything to do at my apartment
Doing laundry and cleaning the apartment all day...then packing and preparing to leave tomorrow afternoon
Watching season 1 of Doug and Roger Klotz just referred to Skeeter as "Skeet-Face" WTF!?
